definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: In those days we did not need spies to watch the enemy's movement .
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子里，我们不需要情报员注意敌人动向。

sentences.english: Journalists are studying the minister's speech for pointers to the contents of next month's policy statement.
sentences.chinese: 记者们在研究部长讲话以揣摩下月施政报告中的动向。

sentences.english: Yin Mingzhu arrange corporal Kim bum to monitor Xu Darong all movements.
sentences.chinese: 尹明珠安排下士金范来监视徐大荣的所有动向。

sentences.english: MAPS and statistics can tell us a lot about where a country is headed.
sentences.chinese: 地图和统计表最能告诉我们一个国家的发展动向。

sentences.english: That’s bound to lead to new movements that emphasize self-transcendence but put little stock in divine law or revelation.
sentences.chinese: 这必然导致强调自我超越但忽视教条和启示的新动向。

sentences.english: These developments, however, present management challenges.
sentences.chinese: 这些新动向同时也带来了新的管理挑战。

sentences.english: Plot: Straight-to-video adaptation of Oniroku Dan's legendary SM novel.
sentences.chinese: 视频Oniroku丹的传奇小说改编的动向。

sentences.english: The physiological functions and researched trend of oligopeptides of high Fischer ratio were stated.
sentences.chinese: 简述了高F值寡肽的生理功能及研究动向。

sentences.english: Who keeps a pulse on market trends and competitors’ moves?
sentences.chinese: 谁去掌握市场趋势和竞争对手的动向？

sentences.english: This paper describes newly technology trend and future demand predication of FPC material.
sentences.chinese: 概述了FPC材料的最新技术动向和未来的需求预测。

sentences.english: Shifting from quantity orientation to quality orientation is the world trend for apple cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 由数量型向质量型转变，是苹果栽培的世界性动向。

sentences.english: This book treats of new trends in surgery.
sentences.chinese: 这本书写的是外科方面的新动向。

sentences.english: E-government is a trend of government information resource management.
sentences.chinese: “电子政府”是政府信息资源管理的新动向。

sentences.english: Finally, aspects in birdsong for further study in China were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 分析了中国鸟声研究的动向。

sentences.english: Population suburbanization is a new tendency for city expansion in China.
sentences.chinese: 人口郊区化是我国大城市发展的新动向。

sentences.english: The development of nano onion-like fullerenes in recent years is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 评述了纳米洋葱状富勒烯的研究发展过程和动向。

definition: to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking
to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
